pullrequest.title: Explicit call to ruby to fix the run of xmlschema on windows

content.raw:
I merged pull request #153, then merged with default. Now this is able to compile and install, though all the tests fail. This causes it to be marked as a failure. Though perhaps it should just be marked as unstable?

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-windows7-amd64/68/
